EmailTemplate.name: 2021 Dealer Update #5.2021 Dealer Update #5
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins - February 2021
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sales Bulletins | February 2021 New Sales Bulletins Honeywell is pleased to announce the following bulletins:
- 2021-04 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-04 - Hawker 800 1000 Special Offering FMS 6-1 ADSB.pdf]]> Hawker 800/1000 Special Offering FMS 6.1 & ADS-B - 2021-19 Rev B <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-19-Rev-B-DU-875-LCD-Display-Unit-Upgrades-for-All-Platforms.pdf]]> DU-875 Display Upgrade for Business Aircraft - 2021-21 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-21-Rev A-DU-1310-Display-Replacement.pdf]]> DU-1310 Display Replacement - 2021-33 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-33 Rev A Aspire 200 for Fixed Wing Aircraft.pdf]]> Aspire™ 200 for Fixed-Wing Aircraft - 2021-43 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-43 Rev A Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters.pdf]]> Aspire™ 200 with HDR For Helicopters - OIB 2021-14 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/OIB-2021-14-SmartRunway-SmartLanding-Upgrade-for-Business-Aircraft.pdf]]> SmartRunway/SmartLanding Upgrade for Business Aircraft
- OIB 2021-25 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/OIB-2021-25-JetWave-Satellite-Communications-System.pdf]]> JetWave Satellite Communications System
Dealers can find these bulletins on our website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> under Purchase/Orders/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
